movie_title: New national study on childhood food allergies in Singapore
introduction: A new national study aims to uncover the prevalence of food allergies among children in Singapore an

vocabulary.definition: the condition of being widespread or generally accepted
vocabulary.example: The prevalence of smartphones among teenagers is increasing.

vocabulary.definition: to judge or determine the significance, worth, or quality of something
vocabulary.example: The teacher will evaluate the students' performance based on their final exams.

vocabulary.definition: to handle, direct, or control in action or use
vocabulary.example: She was able to manage her time effectively to complete all her tasks.

vocabulary.definition: a damaging immune response by the body to a substance, especially pollen, fur, a particular food, or dust, to which it has become hypersensitive
vocabulary.example: His allergies act up whenever he is near cats.

vocabulary.definition: a system or ordered way of doing things
vocabulary.example: The new exercise regime helped her lose weight.

vocabulary.definition: to fill in or close up a hole or open space
vocabulary.example: They needed to plug the leak in the roof before the rain started.
